suggest.meta_keywords: Image Processor, Edge Computing, Real-Time Metrics, Image Optimization, Image Resizing, Image Cropping, Image Formats, Watermarking Images, Image Conversion, Image Quality Adjustment
suggest.meta_description: Discover how the Edge Application's Image Processor optimizes web images with resizing, cropping, format conversion, and quality control for enhanced performance.

current.meta_description: Image Processor allows you to optimize, resize, crop, and apply filters to your images automatically. This provides a more dynamic and faster user experience in your web applications.
